TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebReferenceCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this class to pass a collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference> objects when invoking the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter.GenerateWebReferences%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 Add(class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference webReference) cil managed

Docs.summary: Appends a instance to the collection.
Docs.returns: The index of the appended Web reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The index of the appended Web reference is greater by one than the index of the last appended Web reference. The index is zero based.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this method. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceCollection> class.

Docs.returns: if the collections contains the given Web reference instance; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference[] array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of Web references into which the collection members are copied.
The array index at which to begin copying.
Docs.summary: Copies members of the collection to a specified array, starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The index is zero based. The array must be large enough to fit the contents of the collection copied into it starting at the specified array index.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference webReference) cil managed

Docs.param: The Web reference to search for.
Docs.summary: Determines the index of the specified instance.
Docs.returns: The index of the specified Web reference, or -1 if the collection does not contain the specified Web reference.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The index is zero based.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference webReference) cil managed

Docs.param: The index at which to insert the specified Web reference.
Docs.summary: Inserts the specified instance at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The indices of members of the collection with indices higher than `index` are each increased by one. Indices are zero based.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the instance at the specified index.
Docs.value: The instance at the specified index.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The index is zero based.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference webReference) cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the specified instance from the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the collection contains multiple instances of the specified Web reference, only the first instance is removed.
